page.title: 19CUSTOMS AND EXCISE
page.content:
Figures for seizures at Dover Docks in 1984 are:-
OVERALL SEIZURES 9,035 DRUG SEIZURES 346
Any seized drugs are taken to a warehouse _ a sample is taken and the total weight recorded for any following trial _ the bulk of the drug is then destroyed in an incinerator. Any alcohol or cigarettes seized are auctioned or destroyed,eg. cigarettes and pornographic items are incinerated and alcohol is poured down the sewer.
If the Channel Tunnel is built there will be a dramatic increase in the risk of rabies in this country.A reason for concern is that rats will inhabit the tunnel and carry the disease into Great Britain.
